body.name: Quican Smart Watches for Women, iOS Android Phones Compatible, Waterproof Fitness Tracker Smartwatches with Call, Alexa Voice, Heart Rate Monitoring, Sleep Tracking, 1.8 Inches (White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 11 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 5 hrs 41 mins
features: ✅【24/7 Monitor Your Health】Our fitness smart watches with advanced sensors continuously monitoring all-day your heart rate, blood oxygen, and stress level, ensuring that you are always aware of your physical condition. Whether you're working out, going for a walk, or just sitting at your desk, you have accurate and up-to-date information about your health.

✅【Use Alexa Hands-free】Fitness tracker smartwatches with Alexa Built in you can ask for news, weather, and other information without even touching your phone or watch. and other convenient features such as an alarm clock, weather forecast, sedentary reminder, menstrual period record, drink water reminder, remote camera, music control, etc.

✅【Track Your Sleep】The sleep tracker watch helps you understand your sleep patterns, including how long you sleep, light sleep, deep sleep, when you wake up, and how restful your sleep is. This information can help us understand the sleep quality every night. Make adjustments to improve your overall sleep quality.

✅【Smartwatch that Can Call and Receive Text】with Bluetooth connectivity, this Bluetooth fashion smart watch allows you to Answer/make calls, and receive smart notifications for SMS, Email, and SNS on your watch without taking out your phone. Vibration ensures we never miss an important call or message.

✅【7-Days Long Battery Life】 Enjoy up to 7 days of battery life on a single 2.5 Hours charge with Quican multifunctional smart watch, so you can use your watch all week without worrying about recharging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My new fitness watch has been a great addition to my fitness routine. I bought this specific watch because of it's O2 feature. It is working well.As for customer service, this company is wonderful. My original band had a flaw so I contacted John McAdams. He immediately sent a new band. It wasn't the same band... It was a much better one.I would purchase this watch as a gift for a loved one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice watch at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this watch for almost two weeks and used it every day. The most difficult thing was set up, as there is no manual, just a quick start guide. However, the watch is pretty intuitive and I got through it. Battery life is great for me. I only have step monitoring turned on. My charges last 4-5 days. If I turn on the other monitoring functions I have to charge everyday. Charging takes less than an hour.I love being able to change the watch face and to customize it. It makes the watch fun. I'm finding that I'm using Alexa on this watch quite a bit too.The phone on this device works great and so does text/email notification once your settings are in place. I genuinely recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Far So Good
reviews.reviewText: Works great for the price. After having it for a few weeks here are my observations.Cons:* I do not like the plastic band that this and many other watches come with these days. It was easy to replace with a 22mm band I already had* A few times it has stopped transmitting my heart rate to the phone.* Charts in the app can be hard to view. No way to expand them to make them easier to see.Pros:*Easy to see screen.* You can set it to come on when you raise your wrist to view the time. This is easy to turn off and on from the watch. I like it on when I am awake and off when I am trying to sleep.* Battery lasts me the week and then some. I charge it on Mondays and then again on Friday. It goes from ~85% change to ~50% charge. I could charge less often but if I charge on Mondays and Fridays the time it takes to charge matches the time I spend in the bathroom getting around those mornings. I put it on the changer and it is back to ~85% charged by the time a shower, brush my teeth, shave, etc. There are a number of options that effect how fast it uses charge so your experience my vary.* Many dial faces and you can make your own. Many of the faces and the ability to make your own are no change. Other faces cost a small fee. I have been plenty happy with the free ones. You can fit a number of faces on the watch and easily switch between them. It is easy to make your own custom simple digital face. You pick a background photo and a choose where the time will appear on the screen and what color to use for the time. My normal watch face is our dogs.* The sleep tracking seems to be as accurate as you would expect. Of course, if you are awake but staying really still it may think you are asleep.* The company seems to still be supporting this watch. It got a firmware update a few weeks after I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch for the money - Try it and see!!
reviews.reviewText: I had a Versa watch for 2 years and it died on me. I didn't want to spend another 200-300 dollars for another watch so I purchased this one for under 30.00 I downloaded the app and it works better than my Versa. They offer different bands also. This watch does more than my Versa and it's easy to set up. Thanks, Amazon for offering a watch that doesn't break the bank!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT! SOOO WORTH IT
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This watch has been the best watch I've ever had for way less the price of the Samsung Galaxy watch I had. This one works better than the Samsung one, does more, and even LOOKS better. I paid hundreds for that one, and about $20 for this one. My phone doesn't even have to be in the same room to work, unlike my Samsung. I'm SO HAPPY with my purchase, very surprised by how well it works, how well it's made, and how much I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't keep time
reviews.reviewText: The time on the watch is constantly wrong, i.e. slow. It's now 45 minutes behind and there seems to be no way to set the time to the correct time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great watch, but batteries life is not 7 days
reviews.reviewText: I love this watch and all the health functions that are given in there. I am able to track my sleep and understand my good days and bad days. I love how this is able to fit my needs for what I need it to do, but the advertisement that this watch last's 7days is false advertisement. If I use my watch on a daily with all the functions I need there it will last me 3 days at the most NOT 7 days. Be wary of your watch battery life if you do need something that will last a little longer before having to recharge. If you just need to use it simply as a watch then yes it might last you the 7 days, but if not and you want to utilize it's functions remind yourself to charge your watch every other night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My first smartwatch
reviews.reviewText: Took me a minute or two to set up but once done I'm loving it. It was very easy to figure once set up to operate. I got two and the other one was a gift for my boyfriend and he likes his too.The only complaint I would have would be I wish it measured you blood pressure and let you respond to text even a pre selected list of responses. But over all for my first smart watch it is awesome.

reviews.reviewTitle: Su calidad y precio son muy buenos

reviews.reviewText: C’est une super montre qui fonctionne bien et qui a une bonne autonomie, elle se connecte très bien au téléphone et l’application est très bien!Il y a plusieurs mode pour les différents type d’activité sportive et a priori je pense que les mesures sont bonne. je la recommande

Acabo de recibirlo. Está muy bonito. Compré el de pantalla 1.8 en blanco. Conectado al móvil en un minuto. Conectado tb a alexa sin problema. Le pongo 4 estrellas porque la aplicación a la que hay que conectarlo, Veryfit, es bastante mala, tienes que tenerla siempre abierta en segundo plano si no, se desconecta del smartwatch. Recibe y realiza llamadas con un buen audio. En general y por el precio, buen producto. Eso sí, no tiene NFC para pagar con él, pero yo no lo echo en falta. Buena compra.

Dans l'ensemble cette montre offre des fonctionnalités interessantes, elle est assez légère, assez fine, arbore un design assez connu et est compatible android et ios.Son écran est plutot lumineux et qualitatif (pas au même niveau qu'une montre samsung ou apple malgré tout).On retrouve pas mal de fonctions que l'on retrouve dans toutes les montres connectées, a savoir des fonctionnalités de :- santé (fréquence cardiaque, oxygène dans le sang, suivi cycle menstruel, suivi du sommeil)- suivi de sport- notifications relayées sur la montre- horloge, alarme, chrono, ...Quelques fonctionnalités qu'on voit plus rarement voir jamais sont également présentes :- micro et haut-parleur sur la montre pour prendre les appels (qualité très moyenne, à reserver dans des situations très particulières- intégration de l'assistant Alexa !!! Pour le coup c'est une feature très intéressante car cela permet beaucoup d'interaction avec la montre et celle-ci devient beaucoup plus "intelligente". Par contre, je n'ai pas osé tester cette fonctionnalité .... Normalement les risques sont très limités mais je me vois mal me connecter à mon compte amazon depuis l'application de la montre .... Pas assez confiance.- intégration d'un calcul de stress (ca vaut ce que ca vaut ... )A noter que l'application est également très agréable et est plutôt réussie.Concernant la qualité de la mesure de la fréquence cardiaque, elle s'en tire bien sur les efforts légers et modérés (je l'ai comparé à une pixel watch qui a de bonnes mesures). Par contre, comme beaucoup de montres, elle peine beaucoup dans les efforts a plus haute intensité et les fractionnés.Malgré tout, il y a quand même pas mal de lacunes :- pas de GPS, donc pour les sportifs, il faudra avoir votre téléphone avec vous si vous souhaitez avoir le suivi GPS- pas beaucoup d'applications installées et impossible d'en installer d'autres- beaucoup de cadrans disponibles (très bon point) mais les cadrans ne sont pas intéractifs (par exemple, celui sur la photo, on pense qu'on peut appuyer sur les petites vignettes mais non)- beaucoup de sports proposés mais je doute que les algos derrière chaque sport soient vraiment optimisés.Au final cette montre offre un bon rapport qualité prix et son avantage par rapport aux autre, c'est l'intégration d'Alexa, si vous avez confiance pour l'installer.
Manual en castellano, reloj bonito. De momento todo bien
